question: 折り返し
sourceAnswer: by-return/(call-or-write-back)-without-delay | lapel/cuff/turn-up/flap | going-back/returning/turn-(marathon,-swimming,-etc.) | chorus/refrain | shuttle-service | aliasing-(in-imaging) | back-to-back/BTB | wrapping-(text-on-computer-screen)/wrap
